sentences.sentence: Hexalobular socket countersunk head tapping screws.
Name two head styles of machine screws that are countersunk.
sentences.translation: 沉头机螺钉有哪两种头型？

sentences.sentence: Countersunk rivet symbol. Use in conjunction with other rivet ends.
sentences.translation: 埋头铆钉符号。与其他铆钉端点结合使用。
